name: Battle Monsters
storyline: It is the year 2465 and humans and monsters live together. There are also people that catch monsters to train them and let them battle against each other. You are one of them. After you've got the first monster of professor Bradley, you've decided to start your journey to become the best monster trainer.
summary: Battle Monsters is an early German RPG-Maker Pokémon clone by Pascal Cattarius.
